metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11729 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** The libfsntfs_mft_entry_read_header function in libfsntfs_mft_entry.c in libfsntfs through 2018-04-20 allows remote attackers to cause an information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted ntfs file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in libyal/libfsntfs issue 8 on GitHub.

criterions.comment: libfsntfs package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
